Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute near California/Wellington
ShortDescription: 94 California buses temp. rerouted NB: California, Diversey, Western, Belmont, & Rockwell; SB: Rockwell, Addison, Western, Belmont, & California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near California/Wellington

Northbound buses will operate via California, Diversey, Western, Belmont, & Rockwell

Southbound buses will operate via Rockwell, Addison, Western, Belmont, & California.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Midway-bound Orange and 63rd-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Midway-bound Orange & 63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at Roosevelt due to a  minor report of a fire at track level. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Midway-bound Orange Line trains are standing near the area of Roosevelt due to a  minor report of a fire at track level. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
